parsed_json.name: Pushups
parsed_json.summary: Exercise that uses multiple muscle groups to do a pushing motion

steps.description: Tilt your pelvis backward and keep your butt squeezed tight
Place your wrist in a nearly vertical line under your shoulder for standard pushups
Go all the way up and all the way down and let your body straight
When you are going down your shoulder blades come together and when you are going up they go apart
Focus on pushing them downward instead of upward
